properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Aoka homban'ny elatrao ;
Ny fifankatiavanay.
Ny Fanahy Masinao
No hitarika anay.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Ny fiainana any an-danitra
'Zay feno fitiavana.
No irinay hiainanay
Dieny ety ka hatrary.
Ry fitiavana ô,
Meteza hiaraka aminay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kendrena mba hirindra
Sy ho tsara indrindra
Hatrizao ny fiainanay,
Ho voninahitry ny Ray.
Ny fiainana, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Enga anie 'zahay izao
Samy hotoloranao
Ilay tany vaovao
Mirindra sy mirenty ao.
Ny fiainan-danitra
'Zay feno fitiavana.
No irinay hiainanay
Dieny ety ka hatrary.
Andriamanitra ô,
Meteza hiaraka aminay.
